name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】遂に復帰‼重大告知ライブ【#星街すいせい重大告知】 [CPUYPXa7D7s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei continues her performance of the song 'TEMPLATE' at her 3D live concert.
A brief intermission and transition on stage as the title card for the next song, 'GHOST', is displayed.
Hoshimachi Suisei performs the song 'GHOST', showcasing powerful vocals and emotional choreography.

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 好き放題を殺し、カス以下の種に降っても
subtitles.english: Killing self-indulgence, even if it rains on seeds less than trash

subtitles.original: のぼる僕は要らない この街の頭上
subtitles.english: I don't need the 'me' that rises above this city

subtitles.original: 降り注いだ慈愛を 拒絶はしない
subtitles.english: I won't reject the affection pouring down

subtitles.original: 僕のこと 痛みも 姿形も
subtitles.english: About me, my pain, my form

subtitles.original: 誰に決められることもない
subtitles.english: It won't be decided by anyone

subtitles.original: そっと僕にとって世界なんて...
subtitles.english: To me, a world like this is just...

subtitles.original: この世界 正しさが間違いだ...
subtitles.english: In this world, correctness is a mistake...

subtitles.original: あの日 放射状の輝きに...
subtitles.english: That day, in the radial glow...

subtitles.original: 蔓延る 虚像よりも
subtitles.english: Rather than the spreading illusions

subtitles.original: 届かなくたって構わない 僕以外何も要らない
subtitles.english: I don't care if it doesn't reach, I don't need anything but myself

subtitles.original: ふっと弾けた感情に
subtitles.english: To the emotions that suddenly burst

subtitles.original: 言い訳を並べて過ごした
subtitles.english: I spent time lining up excuses

subtitles.original: 葛藤も知らない街角に
subtitles.english: In a street corner that doesn't know conflict

subtitles.original: 君だけだって嘯いた
subtitles.english: I boasted that there was only you

subtitles.original: 信じたくもないままで踊っている
subtitles.english: Dancing while not even wanting to believe

subtitles.original: 殺すために連ね続けた言葉
subtitles.english: Words I kept stringing together in order to kill

subtitles.original: 見えないの僕が
subtitles.english: Can't you see me?

subtitles.original: 僕のこの声が聞こえてる
subtitles.english: Can you hear this voice of mine?

subtitles.original: Dancer in the silhouette
subtitles.english: Dancer in the silhouette

subtitles.original: すらも透明できっと無骨だけれど
subtitles.english: Even that's transparent and surely clumsy

subtitles.original: でも せめて声を鳴らそう
subtitles.english: But at least let's make a sound

subtitles.original: 指にしがみついてもずっと証明を
subtitles.english: Even if I cling to my fingers, forever the proof...

subtitles.original: 見逃すなよ 痛いんだ
subtitles.english: Don't miss it, it hurts

subtitles.original: 散々恨んだ 明るいストロボ
subtitles.english: The bright strobe lights I've hated so much

subtitles.original: 意味ありげに伸びていく影
subtitles.english: Shadows stretching out as if they mean something

subtitles.original: 淡々と過ぎた 一粒の
subtitles.english: At a single word that passed by indifferently

subtitles.original: 君の言葉で泣きたくなった
subtitles.english: I felt like crying at your word

subtitles.original: 大切にしたいものが零れていく
subtitles.english: The things I want to treasure are spilling away

subtitles.original: 記すために綴り続けたい言葉
subtitles.english: Words I want to keep writing in order to record

subtitles.original: 見えてるの僕が
subtitles.english: Can you see me?

subtitles.original: 僕のこの声が聞こえてる
subtitles.english: Can you hear this voice of mine?

subtitles.original: Dancer in the silhouette
subtitles.english: Dancer in the silhouette

subtitles.original: すらも透明できっと不器用だけれど
subtitles.english: Even that's transparent and surely clumsy

subtitles.original: でも だから叫んで 喘いで
subtitles.english: So I shout and I pant

subtitles.original: 正しのまま走れねぇ 気づいて
subtitles.english: I can't run while remaining 'correct', notice me

subtitles.original: 教えてよ 答えを
subtitles.english: Tell me the answer

subtitles.original: こんな僕の心まで奪い去って
subtitles.english: Take away even a heart like mine
